Description: Just in to the shop this beautiful hardly played pre-owned guitar in excellent condition that has been in the case with the original strings still on just like the day it was made in 2008. We have included the description from Gibson below. Includes original plastic pick guard film left on by original owner! OVERVIEW An axe made "for those about to rock." The Gibson Angus Young Signature SG is a faithful reproduction of Young's trademark axe! It's exact, even down to the worn engraving on the Lyre Vibrola tailpiece. Mahogany body and neck, 22-fret rosewood fingerboard with pearl trapezoid inlays, single-bound neck, nickel hardware, a '57 Classic humbucker (neck), an Angus Signature humbucker (bridge), and devil graphic on headstock. Definitely a guitar that's made to rock "all night long."FEATURESMahogany body and neck22-fret rosewood fingerboardPearl trapezoid inlay24.75" scaleSingle-bound neckABR bridgeEngraved Lyre Vibrola tremoloNickel hardware'57 Classic humbucker (neck)Angus Signature humbucker (bridge)2 tone and 2 volume controls3-way selector switchPlease look carefully at the photos before purchasing, as with any used instrument there are a few small nicks and scratches and we did our best to capture them in the photos.
